item.description:
We will meet to sand and paint the picnic tables for the park. Please bring course sand paper and manual sanders, wide paint brushes and rags if you have them. Or just bring yourself....we need LOTS of help to get the job done sooner than later so we can get these tables back into the park.

Go to this website to see dog park pictures taken by John Moffat, showing the recent drainage project.

http://www.dropshots....

See you on Sunday!!
item.name: Park Improvements
